entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
